entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming southeast 30 this evening then light late this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon.
